Package edu.monash.fit2099.gridworld

Enum Grid.CompassBearing

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Grid.CompassBearing>
      • edu.monash.fit2099.gridworld.Grid.CompassBearing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Direction, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Grid.CompassBearing>
    Enclosing class:
    Grid<T extends Location>
    public static enum Grid.CompassBearing
extends java.lang.Enum<Grid.CompassBearing>
implements Direction
    Class that manages the direction in which an Entity is heading as shown by a compass. Supports an 8-way movement (N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW).

    All CompassBearings are measured relative to the North (at 0 degrees) in a 360-degree system.

      • opposite

        public static Grid.CompassBearing opposite​(Grid.CompassBearing cb)
        This method will return the antipode (the opposite bearing) of a given CompassBearing

        Ex: Antipode of NORTH is SOUTH

        Parameters:
        cb - the CompassBearing for which the antipode needs to be found
        Returns:
        the antipode of the given compass bearing cb

      • turn

        public Grid.CompassBearing turn​(int angle)
        This method will return the closest CompassBearing after turning angle amount clockwise.

        The new angle after the turn will be rounded up to fall in a 360-degree system that matches of one of the 8 directions.

        Parameters:
        angle - the size of the angle in degrees that needs to be turned clockwise
        Returns:
        the CompassBearing after turning angle degrees clockwise

      • getRandomBearing

        public static Grid.CompassBearing getRandomBearing()
        This method will return a random CompassBearing.
        Returns:
        a random CompassBearing
